Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory671.jpg'}
{3: "Following Sophia's message, you now find yourself in a secluded street."}
{3: "Unlike the other places with bustling crowds, there aren't many people here."}
{3: "Looking around, you don't see Sophia anywhere."}
{3: 'Right when you start wondering when she might be, you catch strands of white hair from the corner of your eye.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'There it is.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'When your eyes meet hers, Sophia furtively gestures for you to head over.'}
{2: 'You said you needed help in the message you sent me, right?', 3: '22'}
{3: 'When Sophia sees you, she produces a voucher from her pocket.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'This is what I meant.', 4: '1'}
{3: "You read what it says on the voucher and see it's for a limited Valentine's Day event at Constellia."}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=43>"Phantom Thief Adventure for Two: Target the Ultra-Rare Diamond in the Exhibition Hall! (Note: Made from Cut Glass)"</size></color>'}
{3: '"Phantom Thief Adventure for Two: Target the Ultra-Rare Diamond in the Exhibition Hall! (Note: Made from Cut Glass)"'}
{1: '<color=#ffffffff><size=48>"Build a stronger bond through this thrilling adventure and see your heartbeat shoot through the roof!"</size></color>'}
{3: '"Build a stronger bond through this thrilling adventure and see your heartbeat shoot through the roof!"'}
{2: 'This seems kind of sketchy...', 3: '37', 4: "It's... the Phantom Thief Adventure for Two!!", 5: '42'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Sophia seems unsatisfied with your reaction.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Phantom thieves. Super cool.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yeah, they are.', 3: '45'}
{1: '1', 3: 'She seems happy with your reaction, a hint of pride glimmering in her smile.'}
{3: 'Sophia pulls out two masks from behind her back and offers one to you.'}
{2: '(Accept the mask)', 3: '50'}
{3: 'Despite feeling somewhat puzzled, you accept the mask.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I read about phantom thieves in a book.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'When you put on the mask, you turn into a phantom thief and can summon your persona.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: "But for that to happen, we'll have to shout...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: '"Psyche Mask"!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With that, Sophia puts on her mask and strikes a cool pose.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "That's right! Just like that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Yeah, that looks cool.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Sophia looks excitedly at you and the mask in your hand.'}
{3: 'Seeing how interested Sophia seems, you think it would be a shame to dampen her enthusiasm.'}
{3: 'So you decide to strike the same pose she just did.'}
{3: "In a secluded alley, masked strangers striking poses that are either cool or just plain weird shout out the Phantom Thieves' declaration."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: "We're here for the ultra-rare diamond in the exhibition hall!", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory307.png'}
{1: 'RImgBg1Shake'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid Guard A', 3: 'The Phantom Thieves are here!!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Tis a peaceful afternoon in Constellia, its tranquility now shattered.'}
{3: 'Dong dong...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory672.jpg', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mechanoid Guard B', 3: 'Over here!', 4: '11'}
{3: '(A loud explosion blares from the speakers)—'}
{1: '11', 2: 'Mechanoid Guard C', 3: 'Ah, the Phantom Thieves got me.', 4: '11'}

{3: 'One of the mechanoid guards delivers its line in a flat, emotionless customer service voice, then dramatically falls to the ground with an exaggerated motion. A few seconds later, it gets back up, still muttering under their breath.'}
{2: 'Mechanoid Guard C', 3: "Shift's over. Let's call it a day.", 4: '11'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Sophia', 3: 'The diamond is right up ahead.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Let's make this quick."}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory69.jpg'}
{3: "Inside Sophia's little shelter, Constellia."}
{3: "Having overcome all sorts of bizarre obstacles, you're now finally holding the diamond in your hand."}
{3: 'You were left awestruck by how agile Sophia was during the heist.'}
{3: 'Encouraged, you attempted a few difficult maneuvers yourself, only to throw out your back after an ambitious 720° aerial spin followed by a rolling slide tackle.'}
{2: 'Argh, guess the human body does have its limits after all...', 3: '122'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Sophia walks to the bed with some sweets in hand, looking somewhat shy.'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'I had a great time today.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Let me give you a back massage.', 4: '1'}
{2: "Yes, please! I'd appreciate that!", 3: '127'}
{2: 'Sophia', 3: 'Alright, then... Here goes.', 4: '1'}
